snippet.title: Shield Blast | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Release trailer for Shield Blast.

Now Available on:
►itchio - https://lixiangames.itch.io/shieldblast
►GameJolt - https://lixian.gamejolt.io/shieldblast

Twitter►https://twitter.com/LixianTV
Facebook►https://www.facebook.com/LixianTV

Yes I made a game xD
Turns out game dev is super fun and I decided to make this game.
All feedback is welcome and appreciated.

Hope you guys like it ;)
